## fixed() function

保留len位小数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function fixed(value: any, len?: number): any;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | 数值 |
|  len | number | <i>(Optional)</i> 默认保留两位小数 |
